content.body: FWIW, I do not buy this use case. I'm willing to be convinced with concrete worked examples, but conversion isn't even part of Amount right now, and infinite values are just not well-behaved like that (e.g., what would one do with ∞ degrees?)
yeah i don't really buy this either, infinity isn't an amount
if you want infinity (or NaN) you could use ±`Infinity` on its own
